title: Cannabis Intelligence Database: AI-Enhanced Multi-Breeder Genetics Repository
description: World's largest cannabis genetics database with 15,778 strains and 8,792 AI-extracted data points from 200+ professional breeders. Features advanced pattern recognition for THC/CBD extraction, genetic ratio analysis, and cultivation intelligence mining from strain descriptions. Production REST API at api.loyal9.app with sub-500ms response times on AWS serverless architecture.
